units.title: Obtain six-well plate of hPSCs on MEFs
units.text: (i) Obtain a six-well plate of high-quality hPSCs grown on MEFs (~80% conﬂuency) in standard hPSC culture medium containing 20% KnockOut Serum Replacement (Fig. 3a).
units.rationale: Sets up the starting cell culture for the protocol.

units.title: Aspirate medium, wash and add Accutase
units.text: (ii) Aspirate the medium and wash with 3 mL of PBS w/o. Add 500 μL of Accutase, and place the plate into a humidiﬁed incubator at 37 °C for 3 min.
units.rationale: Begins enzymatic dissociation of the colonies.

units.title: Add DMEM/F12 and disperse colonies
units.text: (iii) Add 3 mL of DMEM/F12, and disperse the colonies into single cells by pipetting until all cells are detached.
units.rationale: Creates a single‑cell suspension for downstream steps.

units.title: Transfer to conical tube and centrifuge
units.text: (iv) Transfer the cell suspension to a 15 mL conical tube, and centrifuge at 300g for 3 min at 4 °C.
units.rationale: Pellets the cells to allow medium removal.

units.title: Resuspend pellet in E8 + Y27632
units.text: (v) Remove the supernatant, and gently resuspend the cell pellet in 1 mL of E8 + 10 μM Y27632.
units.rationale: Re‑suspends cells in defined medium with ROCK inhibitor.

units.title: Prepare Geltrex-coated T25 flask
units.text: (vi) Take a prepared Geltrex-coated T25 ﬂask, aspirate the medium and add 4 mL E8 + 10 μM Y27632.
units.rationale: Provides a suitable surface for cell attachment.

units.title: Transfer cells to flask and distribute
units.text: (vii) Transfer the cell suspension from step (v) to the T25 ﬂask, and place the ﬂask into the incubator. Move the ﬂask a few times back and forth and left to right at the point where it is placed in the incubator to ensure that the cells are equally distributed (Supplementary Video 1).
units.rationale: Ensures even seeding of cells across the flask.

units.title: Change medium after 2 days
units.text: (viii) Change the medium after 2 d and then daily by aspirating the medium and adding 5 mL of fresh E8. When the cells are conﬂuent, proceed to the next step.
units.rationale: Maintains cell health and promotes confluency.

units.title: Detach hPSCs and count cells
units.text: 10 Detach hPSCs (from Step 9; at an appropriate passage) at 80–90% conﬂuence from a T25 by Accutase treatment, and count the cells as described in Steps 2–5.
units.rationale: Generates a quantified cell suspension for seeding aggregates.

units.title: Prepare stock cell suspension for seeding
units.text: 11 Prepare a stock cell suspension at a concentration of 5,000 cells per 100 µL medium by adding an appropriate amount of cells from Step 10 (based on the desired number of HFOs) to E8 + 10 μM Y27632. Gently resuspend the cells.
units.rationale: Creates the precise cell density needed for uniform HFO formation.
